TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MouseDevice extends System.Windows.Input.InputDevice
Public MustInherit Class MouseDevice Inherits InputDevice
public ref class MouseDevice abstract : System::Windows::Input::InputDevice

summary.span: 表示滑鼠裝置。

span.span: Represents a mouse device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]基礎結構，不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。The supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 滑鼠相關輸入，使用類別。For mouse related input, use the class. 類別代表滑鼠，應用程式，並提供方法、 屬性和可反映的滑鼠狀態事件。The class represents the mouse to an application and provides methods, properties, and events that reflect the state of the mouse.

for getting the active source.
Associated enumerations:

summary.span: 將滑鼠輸入捕捉至指定的項目。

span.span: Captures mouse input to the specified element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當項目捕捉到滑鼠時，不論資料指標位於其框線都會收到滑鼠輸入。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders. 如果未指定，預設值是。If a is not specified, the default is . 若要放開滑鼠捕捉時，呼叫傳遞`null`為要擷取的項目。To release mouse capture, call passing `null` as the element to capture. 如果將滑鼠擷取時或是就會引發事件和滑鼠，底下的項目將不會輸入和先引發。If the mouse is captured when a or event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, and are raised first. 這可讓捕捉的項目釋放擷取，才能有機會和事件會路由傳送。This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the and events are routed.

span.span: is not a or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當項目捕捉到滑鼠時，不論資料指標位於其框線都會收到滑鼠輸入。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders. 若要放開滑鼠捕捉時，呼叫傳遞`null`為要擷取的項目。To release mouse capture, call passing `null` as the element to capture. 如果將滑鼠擷取時或是就會引發事件和滑鼠，底下的項目將不會輸入和先引發。If the mouse is captured when a or event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, and are raised first. 這可讓捕捉的項目釋放擷取，才能有機會和事件會路由傳送。This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the and events are routed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DirectlyOver As IInputElement
public: property System::Windows::IInputElement ^ DirectlyOver { System::Windows::IInputElement ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得滑鼠指標位於其正上方的項目。

span.span: Gets the element that the mouse pointer is directly over.

value.span: 滑鼠指標位於其上方的項目。

span.span: The element the mouse pointer is over.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果滑鼠擷取至該項目，直接透過項目會被視為滑鼠。The mouse is considered directly over an element if the mouse has been captured to that element. 控制項可以包含多個項目。Controls can be composed of multiple elements. 報告在滑鼠指標位於複合控制項並不是控制項本身的特定項目。 reports the specific element in the composite control the mouse pointer is over and not the control itself. 比方說，根據哪一個部分指標是，透過可能會報告屬性的屬性或。For example, depending on which part of a the pointer is over, the property could report the of the property or the . 使用上的屬性和判斷滑鼠是否在項目，包括其視覺子系的項目上方，或控制複合項目。Use the property on and to determine whether the mouse is over an element, which includes its visual child elements or control compositing elements.

member this.OverrideCursor : System.Windows.Input.Cursor with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定整個應用程式的游標。

span.span: Gets or sets the cursor for the entire application.

value.span: 覆寫游標，如果未設定 ，則為 。

span.span: The override cursor or if is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ，是設定為將會套用至整個應用程式。The that is set to will be applied to the whole application. 若要清除覆寫，將至`null`。To clear the override , set to `null`. 設定至會強制滑鼠游標不會顯示，但仍會處理滑鼠事件。Setting to will force the mouse cursor not to be displayed, but mouse events are still processed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個資料指標不會套用任何特定的附註，而是套用至整個應用程式。Note that this cursor does not apply any particular , but rather it applies to the whole application.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Synchronize() cil managed

summary.span: 強制滑鼠重新同步化。

span.span: Forces the mouse to resynchronize.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 監視版面配置的變更並呼叫。The monitors layout changes and calls . 有一些的情況中的滑鼠輸入的系統必須強制更新，使其回應變更。There are cases in which the mouse input system must be forced to update for it to respond to changes. 例如，您必須重新同步處理將滑鼠停在計時器。For example, you must resynchronize the mouse on a timer.
